resources.string: Your coins are not enough! Consider switching a destination or reducing the number of units!
You have not placed 24 magical creatures units!
You have placed more than 24 units!
The mystery of the Ancient Wand remains unsolved. Perform a sacred ritual with the Ancient Wand and a unicorn\'s horn, and perchance it shall bestow you advantage in the contest.
You have no enough horns to upgrade!
You have already upgraded this turn, or your horns are not enough!
You have reached the maximum level!
Your actions have been duly noted.

Now, esteemed sorcerer, you have liberated the GNOME and DWARF from its confinement. Anticipate, a newly-enchanted HOUSE ELF shall appear to bestow its unwavering loyalty and magical talents upon your noble quest.
Rejoice, esteemed spellcaster, for you have now summoned the devoted HOUSE ELF, a humble servant whose unwavering loyalty and magical support shall bolster you in times of need.
Tread cautiously, aspiring sorcerer, as you now unleash the cunning GOBLIN, a wily creature whose expertise in the shadowy arts shall serve you well in your mystical quest.
Beware, bold enchantress, for you have now awakened the enigmatic VAMPIRE, an immortal being whose dark powers and ancient wisdom shall grant you an edge in your magical pursuits.
With great honor, valiant conjurer, you have now beckoned the noble CENTAUR, a wise and majestic ally whose celestial knowledge and prowess in battle shall guide you through the unknown.

Huzzah, illustrious wizard! You have ascended to the pinnacle of arcane mastery, but always remember: the enigma of magic is boundless and ever-evolving, beckoning the insatiable curiosity of those who dare to explore its depths.
Your creature has been successfully upgraded
Your technology level upgrade shall be completed in the following turn

With immense delight, we hereby inform you that your application to Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry has been met with success. Following the Sorting Hat\'s scrupulous contemplation of your inherent qualities and potential, you have been assigned to the distinguished House of:
I\'m Pleased to Accept My Offer
You have 24 units in total. Put them across your territories.
Magical prowess evades the feeble. Huzzah, brave wizard! Thou hast conquered the Triwizard Tournament for thine House! The annals of Hogwarts shall etch thy name in everlasting glory!
Thou hast been defeated. The Triwizard Tournament is over. The annals of Hogwarts shall not record thy name in everlasting glory.
50% chance of 1 unit of creature counting as 1.5 units (rounded down) during an attack.
An additional 15% or 30 points (whichever is higher) of unicorn horns each turn.
20% chance of turning a failed defense into a success, and eliminating all attacking forces.
Resource consumption (move and attack) reduced by 20%.
In the next turn, 30 units of Gnome soldiers will be granted to thee in a random territory.
In the next turn, the unicorn horns required for upgrading all units will be halved.
For the next three turns, thou shalt be immune to attacks (attacking forces will be repelled).
In the next turn, there will be a 20% chance of persuading a territory to switch sides during an attack (no attacking forces will be consumed).
, you lost one of your territories!
, half of your Gnome were eliminated!
, granting thee an 300 Galleons, was utilized
